options: ['They are in Class 8, Grade 1.', 'They are in the dame class.', "I don't know.", 'They are not in the same class.']
questions: What grade are Liu Wei and Jane in?
article: Hi! I'm a Chinese girl. My name is Liu Wei. My English name is Sally. I'm twelve. I'm in Class 8, Grade 1. My English teacher is Mr. Lee. He is from New York. He is a good teacher. I don't know how old he is. My good friend is Jane. She is from Canada. She is in Class 8, Grade 1, too. She is eleven. Who's Linda? She is Jane's sister. Her name is Linda. She is six.
